message.content:
cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.HC 

The paper discusses the development of techniques for automatically generating descriptions of video content based on emotional reactions, which falls under the category of multimedia (cs.MM). The paper also discusses the use of these descriptions for video search and browsing systems, which involves information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper specifically focuses on video content, which is often analyzed using computer vision techniques (cs.CV). Additionally, the paper discusses the challenges of assessing affective responses, which involves natural language processing (cs.CL) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
